H0.text: The A23 road connects London to which coastal resort in East Sussex. Hastings

H1.text: The A23 road connects London to which coastal resort in East Sussex. Eastbourne

H2.text: The A23 road connects London to which coastal resort in East Sussex. Seaford

H3.text: The A23 road connects London to which coastal resort in East Sussex. BRIGHTON

A4.text: The road ends at Old Steine, Brighton, at a roundabout intersecting with the coastal A259 road, and opposite the entrance to the Palace Pier.

A5.text: The 53-mile (85 km) road from London to Brighton forms the basis of the route of the annual London to Brighton Veteran Car Run.
